# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Saite

Відповідь: kLogitech, Inc.

Saitek Logitech, Inc. is a global technology company that designs, manufactures, and markets a range of game controllers, audio products, video projectors, and more. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Fremont, California. It services customers in both the consumer and business sectors, with products sold under the Logitech, Saitek, and Jaybird brand names. They offer a range of PC gaming products, including mice, keyboards, headsets, gamepads, gaming wheels, and flight simulation gear. They are one of the world's leading suppliers of gaming peripherals, as well as computer accessories, with sales in more than 100 countries.
